about_the_game:
Familiars are NPCs that you can assign to certain tasks, such as leveling up Champions, clicking the monsters, or using ultimates. Depending on the assigned task, a Familiar will click a certain number of times per second/minute.

In this pack:

  • Black Cat Familiar
  • 2 Epic Potions of Speed
  • 2 Epic Potions of Giant's Strength
  • 2 Epic Potions of Clairvoyance

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X v10.6, and above
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ Duo 1.83GHz or faster processor

name: Idle Champions - Black Cat Familiar
